short_summary: The scope of work for this project includes repairs to the shoreline at Musgrave Harbour, NL.
description: This is a construction project for the provision of shoreline protection repairs at Musgrave Harbour, NL. \",
full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify - Shoreline Protection Repairs at Musgrave Harbour, NL

**Reference Number:** cb-7319-70967983

**Publication Date:** July 18, 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time:** August 2, 2023, at 14:00

The **Fisheries and Oceans** department invites eligible bidders to participate in this two-phase bid opportunity for **Shoreline Protection Repairs at Musgrave Harbour, NL**.

**Description:**
The scope of work involves construction activities for shoreline protection repairs at Musgrave Harbour, Newfoundland and Labrador.

**Duration of Work:**
The work period will be approximately 20 weeks, commencing upon contract award.

**Two-Phase Competition:**
This invitation to qualify is the first phase of a two-phase competition. Bidders who meet the qualifications requirements will be invited to participate in the second phase, in which they will be required to submit a financial bid.

**Important:**
Before submitting a bid, bidders are required to visit the site and its surroundings to review and verify the form, nature, and extent of the work, materials necessary for completion, and other relevant factors.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The qualifications of bidders will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the project requirements.

**Contact Information:**
If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact Marie-France Chrétien at (450) 521-4448 or DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca.

**Attachments:**
Invitation to Qualify (Request for Qualifications document) and Addendum No. 1 are available for download.
